puavo.desktop.vendor.logo.description: Filesystem path to OS vendor logo

puavo.greeter.background.default.description: The login screen background image, either an absolute path or a file under /usr/share/backgrounds

puavo.greeter.background.firstlogin.description: The login screen background image to use in case nobody has yet logged in into this host (ever)

puavo.greeter.background.mode.description: Background mode: static does nothing, dynamic uses .default, random uses .random.dir for a random choice

puavo.greeter.background.random.dir.description: The directory to choose a random background image when .mode is random

puavo.greeter.logo.description: Absolute path to logo used in login screen (under the login dialog)
